Event.name: Repel
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Defender</fen> successfully repels the aggressive attempt of takeover by an <fen>Enemy</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Defender">We</fex> <t>repelled</t> <fex name="Enemy">the invaders</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Enemy
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fex name="Enemy">Enemy</fex> is the entity that fails to overtake the <fen>Defender</fen>.
<ex>General Monk would <t>repel</t> <fex name="Enemy">Jacobite invaders</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Defender
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Defender</fen> is the land, government, and its people that the <fen>Enemy</fen> fails to seize.
<ex><fex name="Defender">General Winter</fex> <t>repelled</t> invaders from Napoleon to Hitler.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the intensity and extent of the repelling event. </def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The manner in which the <fen>Defender</fen> repels the <fen>Enemy</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The action by which the repelling event is made possible through the efforts of the <fen>Defender</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Defender</fen> succeeds to repel the <fen>Enemy</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>The tool used by the <fen>Defender</fen> to repel the <fen>Enemy</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Invasion_act
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE refers to the <fen>Invasion_act</fen> perpetrated by the <fen>Enemy</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Defender">Spain</fex> pledged to <t>repel</t> <fex name="Invasion_act">any Allied invasion</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Result
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the outcome of the repelling event.</def-root>
